::Spears::

She held the spear steady.
"How about you release him, take me instead and then the deal is 
sealed. Let him go unharmed."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unitron/Koga Shuko/Ramhorn/Anubis/Hades:
> 
> 
> 
> Unitron chuckled, his optics looking into Spears.
> 
> Shuko yelled, Anubis and Hades taking his shots, both firing a 
rocket from 
> the missile launchers at Hot Rod's feet.
> 
> "This is your idea of negotiations!?  Predacon's on crack are more 
> trustworthy than you!  Yes, a cease fire and a cease of attacks for 
five days 
> from us, and 50 kilos of liquid energon to seal the deal, KEEP YOUR 
MEN AT 
> BAY!"
> 
> Ramhorn laughed.  "Bullslag!  Shoot the slagging piles of scrap!  
Shoot them! 
>  One Maximal for several Predacons is worth my death!"
